full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS DKAR PO LA BRTEN PA'I ZHI BA'I SBYIN SREG 'DOD 'JO'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS GSUNG GI DBANG PHYUG RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS DKAR PO LA BRTEN PA'I ZHI BA'I SBYIN SREG 'DOD 'JO'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA' DI NI, RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I RGYAL TSAB DAM PA KHRI CHEN DPAL LDAN GRAGS PA'I SPRUL BA'I SKU RIN PO CHE RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU BYUNG BA 'JIGS MED RIG PA'I SENG GE DANG, DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS DKON MCHOG BCAS KYIS BSKUL NGOR, MANG THOS RIG PA 'DDZIN PA DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO'AM MING GZHAN MI PHAM DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I RDO RJES CHOS SDE CHEN BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYIS BLA BRANG DU SBYAR BA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
